about_the_game:
Become Ichiro and regain all your powers within the world of the dead. Defeat monsters that will do everything possible to stop you. Bosses will be waiting to defeat you. Dodge projectiles and use your skills to make precision jumps throughout various caves and the castle. Hundreds of obstacles will try to stop your challenge. Enough deaths will happen so that you can completely overcome the challenge. Jumps, attacks, dashes, dodges and silent attacks are part of the great adventure. Sharpen your reflexes because you will need all your speed and attention to not get caught.

This is a difficult metroidvania style game with 90's arcade mechanics. It requires precision jumping and good highlights to shoot and jump.
You play Ichiro, a ninja belonging to the village of fire, after separating yourself with other ninjas from other villages to set up the village of peace, you are attacked by the rest of the villages, which do not achieve their goal. You must return from the underworld to save your village, to leave you must recover all your skills.
